case.title: Sick of being single and alone - 26 (London)
case.text:
I'm sick of being single and alone... Miss all the cuddling and having that one person you can always count
Me: 26, mixed race, 5ft 5, athletic, i work, i study, have a nice life but missing that one person to spend my life with.
You: Asian, under 5ft 7, caring, sweet, any kind of body type, any isn't a problem but please be in London
Looking for a woman who is looking to have a serious relationship with a nice, friendly, loving and very caring guy who would treasure them forever then please reply to my ad with the subject line "I'm sick of being alone too!"
